original: intros P Q x y H H0. unfold locally_2d in *. intros eps. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [delta H]. exists delta. intros u v H1 H2. apply H0. intros u0 v0 H3 H4. apply H with (u := u0) (v := v0). apply H1. apply H3. apply H2. apply H4.
